means: 诅咒，咒骂( swear的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was in a right tizzy, muttering and swearing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他心情非常烦乱，嘴里咕咕哝哝地咒骂着。

sentence.Network_en: I was shocked at the swearing.
the swearing-in of the new President

PerfectNetExp.abs: all about dirty words~ -... ... 【粗口(语言)】 swearing;bad language;foul language 【说粗口】 swear;speak foul language.
not swearing in front of the kids ., 忘记在孩子面前不要说脏话.
I would go further than this : swearing is not just tolerable as a stress reliever , it is one of the best ones going .我愿意进一步加以发挥：作为一种缓解压力的方式，讲粗口不仅可以容忍，而且还是最好的方式之一。
a promoter swearing you did side deals with him so you could split my overages !一承办人发誓你和他进行了额外的交易这样你们就可以朋分我的超额利润！

林忆莲 -《爱是唯一》(I Swear)[滚石原版][英文专辑][FLAC]今日热门 24次收藏正在读取……  这里是其它用户补充的资源(我也要补充):
关于英语里to的问题_百度知道 ... prefer...to... 喜欢…胜过… swear to 断言 submit to 忍受.
Unusual names 异乎寻常的名字-英语点津 ... offensive 冒犯的 swear words 脏话 after 根据…命名.
儿童歌曲 - 幼儿歌曲 ... 《imagine 想像》 《I Swear 我宣誓》 《Safe in port》 听荷兰作曲家雷蒙·拉普.

entry.def: If someone swears, they use language that is considered to be rude or offensive, usually because they are angry.

example.ex: It's wrong to swear and shout...
They swore at them and ran off.
example.tran: 他们骂了他们后就跑掉了。

entry.def: If you swear to do something, you promise in a serious way that you will do it.

example.ex: Alan swore that he would do everything in his power to help us...
example.tran: 艾伦许诺要尽其所能帮助我们。

example.ex: We have sworn to fight cruelty wherever we find it...

entry.tran: 发誓，郑重声明，保证(所说属实)
entry.def: If you say that you swear that something is true or that you can swear to it, you are saying very firmly that it is true.

example.ex: I swear I've told you all I know...
example.tran: 我发誓我已经把我所知道的全都告诉你了。

example.ex: I swear on all I hold dear that I had nothing to do with this...
example.tran: 我以身家性命担保，我和这件事无关。

entry.tran: 使发誓，使承诺(保守秘密)
entry.def: If someone is sworn to secrecy or is sworn to silence, they promise another person that they will not reveal a secret.

example.ex: She was bursting to announce the news but was sworn to secrecy.
example.tran: 她急不可待想宣布这个消息，但却发过誓要守口如瓶。

means.word_mean: 1. profane or obscene expression usually of surprise or anger;
2. a commitment to tell the truth (especially in a court of law); to lie under oath is to become subject to prosecution for perjury
